title: Voter tool translations - AIM
description: Voter-tools, the community made tool is only in English. Resources are needed to translate the tool into other languages.
solution: Translate and make available the voter-tool into 6 languages including Spanish, Japanese, French, Russian, Chinese & Portuguese.
experience: AIM members are the team behind the voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool and the Community Landing Page. Developers, designers and data experts.
